    • shuffleRandomly

      private static void shuffleRandomly()
      This method shuffle randomly the grid

      We use shuffle 1 or 2, depending on the generated number

    • shuffle1

      private static void shuffle1()
      This method shuffle so that no tile is on the same starting square with shuffleGrid1

      We create a copy of the original grid, we run a while to find if any tile in the shuffled grid is in the same position as the initial grid

    • shuffle2

      private static void shuffle2()
      This method shuffle so that no tile is on the same starting square with shuffleGrid1

      Same for shuffle1

    • shuffleGrid1

      private static void shuffleGrid1()
      This method shuffles the grid numbers randomly

    • shuffleGrid2

      private static void shuffleGrid2()
      This method shuffles in such a way as to move the tiles a certain number of times

    • getNodeByRowColumnIndex

      private static javafx.scene.Node getNodeByRowColumnIndex(int row, int column)
      This method is used for the handleKeyPress method, which returns the node where the tile is to be moved
      Parameters:
      row - Retrieves the line of the node to be moved
      column - Retrieves the column of the node to be moved
      Returns:
      Return the node found at the specified row and column indices, or null if not found

    • resolve

      static void resolve()
      Solving using the A* algorithme

      the resolve function uses A* algorithm with a priority queue to efficiently explore and find the optimal path from the start state to the goal state while considering the cost and heuristic values.

    • findBlankRow

      private static int findBlankRow(int[][] grid)
      Finds the row of the blank tile in the grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - The 2D array representing the grid.
      Returns:
      The row of the blank tile (counted from the bottom). Returns -1 if the blank tile is not found.
